p: There are five types of lavana commonly used in treatments. Among the lavana, saindhava lavana is the best and considered as sodium chloride/rock salt/bay salt chemically. Rock salt is the purest form of salt, which is free from environmental pollutants and chemical components and does not require a refining process [ 30]. Rock salt is used to cure several disorders and ailments including rheumatic pains, herpes, inflammation, common cold, and cough [ 31].
